content.text:
# Lumière Award for Best Cinematography

}}
The Lumière Award for Best Cinematography (), formerly known as the Prix de la meilleure photographie or the Prix technique CST de la meilleure photographie (until 2015), is an award presented annually by the Académie des Lumières since 2008.
Winners and nominees
Winners are listed first with a blue background, followed by the other nominees.
